Articles.Content:
For some reason, the model exceed the block...

What I should do to fix it, or to avoid it?

Is it growing until it become so big or it is already like this ?

In the first case, this is due to a KSP bug (3 resources without a consumer I think) look for ModuleFixer plug-in thread for this.

Is it growing until it become so big or it is already like this ?

In the first case, this is due to a KSP bug (3 resources without a consumer I think) look for ModuleFixer plug-in thread for this.

It is not growing, I think.

It was suitable, but after I modified the collider, it became something like this
